mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.* FROM `gc_gell` AS a JOIN `gc_gell_setting` AS b ON a.`gell_num` = b.`setting_gell_num` WHERE `gell_address` = #{gell_address};

SELECT a.*, b.*, CASE WHEN a.gell_cate = 0 THEN '게임' WHEN a.gell_cate = 1 THEN '음악' WHEN a.gell_cate = 2 THEN '영화' WHEN a.gell_cate = 3 THEN '운동' WHEN a.gell_cate = 19 THEN '자연' ELSE '기타' END AS gell_cate_text FROM gc_gell a JOIN gc_gell_setting b ON a.gell_num = b.setting_gell_num WHERE a.gell_cate = #{gell_cate}
